about_the_game:
Mission Overview

Carve the path to victory through use of kamikaze attacks!
What? Afraid of dying? Don't be! There's plenty more of you to go around!
Strike the enemy with your dynamic range of weapons, then launch yourself straight at them in one final, glorious, and explosive attack!

The first of its kind in human history.
A self destructive shmup where own plows forward recklessly while destroying everyone and everything along the way.
Squadron, charge!!

Story

It has been 100 years since the beginning of the global war...
A dreadful worldwide conflict which has shown no sign of abating for its entire duration.

Eventually armed robots took the place of soldiers on both sides, propelling warfare as we knew it into further and further extremes of ceaseless destruction. These robots begin to self reproduce. Building their own only to be shot down by their own again...
People began to question whether this cycle of production and destruction would continue indefinitely.

Amid this endless loop of chaos however, one robot boldly raised voice and said...
"Hey, who ate my pudding?”

Characters


Ohka The block-headed and highly dispensable mass-produced robot fighter named after the Yokosuka MXY-7 Ohka


Umeka The sensitive crybaby humanoid attack fighter.


Aya The cool-headed pudding loving tactician. Always has a comeback for the others' buffoonery.


Tsubame Aya's short but loyal comrade.


Zero The mysterious robot girl who holds the key to changing the tide of the war.

System


Use weapons to defeat enemies, then finish them off by hurling yourself at them in an explosive blaze of glory!


Getting shot down is your chance for honor!
Become your own projectile, and fly heroically into your detested foes!

Features

  • A demo version with 10 stages + Tutorial.
  • A brand new kind of shump where you use weapons and kamikaze attacks to quickly clear stages taking down as many enemies with you as possible.
  • Infinite lives! Satisfying game-play where you carve through each stage with enemy devastating self destruction.
  • 3 part score system based on time, number of sorties, and enemies destroyed.
  • A cute yet grim story progressed by comical interaction between chibi style characters.
  • A diverse range of weapons that require selective use depending on each situation.

name: Kamikaze Empire Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11(64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or more
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Chip
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Carve the path to victory with kamikaze attacks! Blow away enemies with outlandish weapons, then become your own projectile and take the rest out in a blaze of explosive glory! A self destructive shmup where you devastate everything in your wake. "Squadron, charge~!"
